{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03545v1", "title": "Blobbed topological recursion and KP integrability", "summary": "We revise the notion of the blobbed topological recursion by extending it to
the setting of generalized topological recursion as well as allowing blobs
which do not necessarily admit topological expansion. We show that the
so-called non-perturbative differentials form a special case of this revisited
version of blobbed topological recursion. Furthermore, we prove the KP
integrability of the differentials of blobbed topological recursion for the
input data that include KP-integrable blobs. This result generalizes, unifies,
and gives a new proof of the KP integrability of nonperturbative differentials
conjectured by Borot--Eynard and recently proved by the authors.", "main_category": "math-ph", "categories": "math-ph,hep-th,math.MP,nlin.SI", "published": "2025-05-06T13:58:45Z"}
